Summary: A blue "star like" object seen disapear !
divs: Sighting DetailsI was enjoying a smoke outside when i looked up above me & seen a very bright star like object, there where no stars out last night, the object was no bigger then a normal star. When i came back outside 1-2 min later after getting my 7x35 zoom scope i viewed it glowing a very pretty blue for about 60 seconds when it blinked on & off for 2-3 seconds then disapeared before my eyes no clouds covered it at that time. I went outside later that night & it was still gone !!! P.S. My mother & i have seen this wierd star like object before, it tends to blink on & off and never moves across the sky like normal stars do though-out the night!
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around March 12th 2011
